item.title: A (big) SQLPackage caveat
item.description: Context I had a request to help with a database from a third-party vendor which uses a lot of FullText-Search (FTS) catalogs. I have to say that I just have played a handful of times with FTS, mostly in a didactic way, and not so much in the perspective of a production system and its maintenance. Long story short, this client had a couple of problems in the past with FTS.
